> only for yearly rast

```{r setup}
library(rtrend)
library(terra)

f = system.file("rast/MOD15A2_LAI_China_G050_2001~2020.tif", package = "rtrend")
r = rast(f)
r
time(r)

slp <- slope_rast(r, period = c(2001, 2020),
  outfile = "LAI_trend.tif", overwrite = TRUE,
  fun = rtrend::slope_mk
)
slp
```

```{r}
plot(slp)
```
